reviews.review_msg: I took Jody for CMNS 220 and 323, and he was great in both classes. Lectures can be a bit sidetracked, but I find it better than 3 hours of boring and dense talking. I felt behind in 323 as I didn't take 223 and Jody was amazingly helpful, his door is literally always open and he will go above and beyond to help you with your papers/assignments.
